mapper.update: update umuseroperlog set oper_type = #{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_agent = #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_time = #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser_type = #{browserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment = #{equipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logon_id = #{logonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where resourceid = #{resourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resourceid, oper_type, create_time, user_id, remote_addr, user_agent, oper_time, address, browser_type, login_type, equipment, logon_id from umuseroperlog where resourceid = #{resourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select resourceid, oper_type, create_time, user_id, remote_addr, user_agent, oper_time, address, browser_type, login_type, equipment, logon_id from umuseroperlog
